019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
022import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
024import java.util.Optional;
025
026/**
027 * A stub for namespaced custom objects.
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
030public class K8sDynamicStub
031        extends K8sGenericStub<K8sObjectState, K8sObjectStates> {
032
033    /**
034     * Instantiates a new dynamic stub.
035     *
036     * @param objectClass the object class
037     * @param objectListClass the object list class
038     * @param client the client
039     * @param group the group
040     * @param version the version
041     * @param kind the kind
042     * @param plural the plural
043     * @param namespace the namespace
044     * @param name the name
045     */
046    protected K8sDynamicStub(Class<K8sObjectState> objectClass,
047            Class<K8sObjectStates> objectListClass, ApiClient client,
048            String group, String version, String kind, String plural,
049            String namespace, String name) {
050        super(objectClass, objectListClass, client, group, version, kind,
051            plural, namespace, name);
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * Get a dynamic object stub. If the version in parameter
056     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
057     * matching group and kind. 
058     *
059     * @param client the client
060     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
061     * @param namespace the namespace
062     * @param name the name
063     * @return the stub if the object exists
064     * @throws ApiException the api exception
065     */
066    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
067        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
068    public static Optional<K8sDynamicStub> get(ApiClient client,
069            GroupVersionKind gvk, String namespace, String name)
070            throws ApiException {
071        return K8sGenericStub.get(K8sObjectState.class, K8sObjectStates.class,
072            client, gvk, namespace, name, K8sDynamicStub::new);
073    }
074}
